title: 114_s2013
content: Los Angeles Homeless Veterans Leasing Act of 2015 This bill authorizes the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to carry out certain leases at the VA's West Los Angeles Campus in Los Angeles, California, for: (1) supportive housing. (2) health, education, family support, vocational training, and other services that principally benefit veterans and their families. And (3) a lease of real property to a California institution that has had a long-term medical affiliation with the VA at such Campus.
